title: MFA Token Reset
description: A user who lost their phone needs their multi-factor authentication (MFA) token reset so they can log in.

tasks.description: Receive the user's request for an MFA reset.
Verify the user's identity through a series of challenge questions or by video call with their manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully and securely verifies the user's identity before proceeding.

tasks.description: Reset the user's MFA token in the IAM system and guide them through enrolling their new device.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully resets the token and the user is able to log in again.
